DOCU_Docu.DOC:
These actions install/uninstall or check the state of MSI packages on Windows operation systems.
=Supported Platforms=
* Microsoft Windows 2003 * Microsoft Windows 2008 * Microsoft Windows 2008 R2
=Rollback=
The actions getting some system information don't need rollbacks, because they do not change the state of your system. Such a method is CHECK_MSI_IS_INSTALLED.
Actions potentially changing the state of your system (INSTALL, UNINSTALL) do not have rollbacks defined yet.
